Go to DAM memo list. Go to the memo list. Mark article marked articles quit marked article Go to shopping cart. Into the shopping cart. If you want to change the order quantity, just enter the required quantity in "Quantity" and click on "Update shopping cart" below. Your invoice #: Your order #: has the following status (see last line for current status) Additional data for status change: Date/time: Code: Action: Comment: Select order Select Change order status Add order status Comment on new order status Password: Enter password E-mail notification: If you want to be informed of your order status as soon as it has been changed, check the following: The message about the ordering procedure. Update Message to SHOP: Here you can send us a message about your order. Select subject: Customer order sent Order from shop received and accepted Shop is waiting for goods delivery from third party Shop is waiting for customer payment Shop is waiting for customer order Order has been paid Goods have been delivered to customer Vouchers have been delivered to customer Other messages from shop An invoice has been issued An invoice has been sent. This order is tax-free.
